mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO TR_ERS_INCIDENT( ID, TYPE,SUBTYPE, INCIDENTLEVEL,SOURCE, STARTTIME,SUBMITTIME, ENDTIME,ROAD, ADDRESS,POINT, X,Y, ORIENTATION,EFFECTEDLANE, INCIDENTDESC,TRAFFICJAM, INJURIED,OTHER, STATE,INCIDENT_NAME,EXECUTE_STATUS, ROAD_TYPE,VEHICLE_NUM,INJURED_NUM, DEATH_NUM,IS_CONGESTION, CONGESTION_START,CONGESTION_END,
IS_SIMULATE,
GEOGRAPHIC_INFORMATION, ADMINISTRATIVE_OFFICE, SECTION, INTERVAL_START, INTERVAL_END, SPOT_FINAL_REPORT, CENTRE_FINAL_REPORT, INCIDENT_NO, CAR_MODULE, ACCIDENT_REASON, ACCIDENT_FORM, TRAFFIC_STOP )VALUES( #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{subtype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{incidentLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startTime,jdbcType=DATE},#{submitTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{endTime,jdbcType=DATE},#{road,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{point,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{x,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{y,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{orientation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{effectedLane,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{incidentDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{trafficJam,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{injuried,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{other,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{incidentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{executeStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{roadType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vehicleNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{injuredNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deathNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{isCongestion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{congestionStart,jdbcType=DATE},#{congestionEnd,jdbcType=DATE},
#{isSimulate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{geographicInformation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{administrativeOffice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{section,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{intervalStart,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{intervalEnd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{spotFinalReport,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{centreFinalReport,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{incidentNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{carModuleStr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accidentReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accidentForm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{trafficStop,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TR_ERS_INCIDENT WHERE STATE IN (0,1,2,3,4,5,7) ORDER BY STARTTIME DESC
SELECT * FROM TR_ERS_INCIDENT WHERE STARTTIME BETWEEN #{startTime,jdbcType=DATE} AND #{endTime,jdbcType=DATE} ORDER BY STARTTIME DESC
SELECT * FROM TR_ERS_INCIDENT t WHERE STATE IN(0,1,2,3,4,5,7) AND ADMINISTRATIVE_OFFICE = #{orgId} ORDER BY STARTTIME DESC
mapper.insert: insert into TR_ERS_USER_REPORT ( REPORT_ID, USER_ID, CONTENT, OCC_TIME, OCC_PLACE, EVENT_TYPE, LATITUDE, LONGITUDE) values ( #{reportId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{occTime, jdbcType=DATE}, #{occPlace, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eventType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{latitude, jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{longitude, jdbcType=FLOAT})

insert into TR_ERS_CMS_EVENT ( ID, CALLER_NAME, CALLER_IC_NO, CALLER_GENDER_CODE, CALLER_PHONE_NO, CALLER_CONTACT_PHONE_NO, CALLER_VEHICLE_PLATE_NO, ROAD_NAME, ROAD_STAKE, LONGITUDE, LATIDUDE, DIRECTION, LOCATION, DESCRIPTION, START_TIME, END_TIME, CONNECTION_ID, RECORD_URL ) values ( #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{callerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{callerICNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{callerGenderCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{callerPhoneNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{callerContactPhoneNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{callerVehiclePlateNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roadName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roadStakeNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{locationLongitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{locationLatidude,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{roadDirection,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eventDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{callStartTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{callEndTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{connectionID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recordingUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: select * from TR_ERS_INCIDENT t WHERE t.incident_no = #{incidentNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select t.name from TR_CM_ENUM t WHERE t.category = #{category,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND t.value = #{value,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
